reviewText: By the 3rd or 4th season, Home Improvement had come into its own. The 5th season is excellent. Any fan of the show will need to add this one to their collection.

Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: Great season, great show. Said it was used but it was in original wrapping when I received it. Great buy.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: This season is definitely one of the best in the series. There are just a lot of episodes that I consider classics in this season. This is the season when Tim gets his Ph.D that makes both Jill and Wilson jealous and this is also the season that has the famous episode about how Randy may have cancer. Whether it is funny or very serious, some of the best episodes are in this season. One of my favorite episodes is "The Look". You can't beat the reaction given by Al and Benny when they see it for the first time. You gotta see it for yourself, I couldn't stop laughing! This season also has the first appearance of Tim's mom. You should definitely get this, the writing is still great.
summary: One of the Best Seasons of the Series
Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: If you love Tim Allen, this series is a must.  My son-in-law loves this series and this particular one was for his Feb birthday. reviewText: During this 5th season the show along with its normal pranks and laughter has some very touching episodes, such as the one where they have a health scare with one of thier sons...It is dealt with seriousness and some laugher periods at the same time which makes the episode meaningful to the audience in many wasys. I would highly recommend this season again if you have fallen in love with it from the begining.

reviewText: Still has the zany antics, but is growing old, just like the stars. Somehow, life doesn't get funnier the older you get, and that's true of this series.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: As in previous seasons, Tim delights our whole family with laughter, as he continues to power up power tools with disastrous results and teaches us more about relationships. Hubby and I love re-watching these family-friendly episodes! I look forward to the next season.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: My family have the first six seasons and enjoy them thoroughly. It has slapstick humor for dad, soft and tender moments for mom, and kids antics for my children. What I like about this program is that the writing is sincere where you can relate to the characters. There is not one episode where my side does not hurt from laughter even after watching them over and over.Each episode runs about 22 minutes in length. And each one leaves you to wonder how does this guy still have a tool show? It must be Al. What I like about this season is the addition of Tim's brother's family in some of the episodes. The local hardware store also becomes a local hangout for the guys and Benny.Good family entertainment.
Title: Home Improvement: Season 5

reviewText: I got this as a birthday present for my son, along with season 6. He loves the series. He watches the whole season, then goes back and watches favorite episode.
